expense.created: A new Expense is created with identifier { param }
expense.updated: A Expense is updated with identifier { param }
expense.deleted: A Expense is deleted with identifier { param }

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Expense { id }?

help.depositAmount:
S’il existe (dans la partie resto par exemple), depositAmount
ou tout autre champ. Ici, on peut en rajouter si besoin.
help.restaurantName:
Ou version restaurantName, restaurantId si c’est un expense côté resto...
Par simplicité, on les appelle hotelName/hotelId (ou on scinde).
